languages.text: {n}Гемункул раздраженно отмахивается.{/n} "Если ты не способ{mf|ен|на} приносить пользу самостоятельно, лучше я подожду, пока ты умрешь и найду более полезный инструмент. Ты долж{mf|ен|на} экономить мое внимание, а не пожирать его".

{n}The Haemonculus waves you off in irritation.{/n} "If you are unable to make yourself useful, I would rather wait for you to die and find myself a better tool. You should be worthy of my attention, not a drain on it."
languages.original_text: {n}Гемункул раздраженно отмахивается.{/n} "Если ты не способ{mf|ен|на} приносить пользу самостоятельно, лучше я подожду, пока ты умрешь и найду более полезный инструмент. Ты долж{mf|ен|на} экономить мое внимание, а не пожирать его".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Haemonculus waves you off in irritation.{/n} "If you are unable to make yourself useful, I would rather wait for you to die and find myself a better tool. I expect you to save my time instead of devouring more of it."

{n}The Haemonculus waves you off in irritation.{/n} "If you are unable to make yourself useful, I would rather wait for you to die and find myself a better tool. I expect you to save my time instead of devouring more of it."

{n}The Haemonculus waves you off in irritation.{/n} "If you are unable to make yourself useful, I would rather wait for you to die and find myself a better tool. You should be worthy of my attention, not a drain on it."

{n}The Haemonculus waves you off in irritation.{/n} "If you are unable to make yourself useful, I would rather wait for you to die and find myself a better tool. You should be worthy of my attention, not a drain on it."

{n}The Haemonculus waves you off in irritation.{/n} "If you are unable to make yourself useful, I would rather wait for you to die and find myself a better tool. You should be worthy of my attention, not a drain on it."

languages.text: {n}ハモンキュラスは苛立ちながら、振り払うような身振りをする。{/n}「もしお前が役立つことを示せなければ、お前が死ぬのを待ってより良い道具を探すとしよう。お前は私の関心を引くに値する存在であらねばならぬ。ムダにはするな」
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus waves you off in irritation.{/n} "If you are unable to make yourself useful, I would rather wait for you to die and find myself a better tool. You should be worthy of my attention, not a drain on it."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハモンキュラスは苛立ちながら、振り払うような身振りをする。{/n}「もしお前が役立つことを示せなければ、お前が死ぬのを待ってより良い道具を探すとしよう。お前は私の関心を引くに値する存在であらねばならぬ。ムダにはするな」

languages.text: {n}血伶人厌恶地挥挥手，示意你退下。{/n}“如果你不能变成个有用的家伙，我宁愿等你什么时候死了，再换个更好用的工具。你应该努力引起我的关注，不该成为累赘。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus waves you off in irritation.{/n} "If you are unable to make yourself useful, I would rather wait for you to die and find myself a better tool. You should be worthy of my attention, not a drain on it."

traits.locale_text: {n}血伶人厌恶地挥挥手，示意你退下。{/n}“如果你不能变成个有用的家伙，我宁愿等你什么时候死了，再换个更好用的工具。你应该努力引起我的关注，不该成为累赘。”

languages.text: {n}Irrité, l'hémoncule balaie votre requête d'un revers de la main.{/n} « Si vous ne pouvez pas vous rendre utile, je préfère attendre que vous mouriez et me trouver un meilleur outil. Vous n'êtes pas digne de mon attention, pourtant vous la gaspillez. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus waves you off in irritation.{/n} "If you are unable to make yourself useful, I would rather wait for you to die and find myself a better tool. You should be worthy of my attention, not a drain on it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Irrité, l'hémoncule balaie votre requête d'un revers de la main.{/n} « Si vous ne pouvez pas vous rendre utile, je préfère attendre que vous mouriez et me trouver un meilleur outil. Vous n'êtes pas digne de mon attention, pourtant vous la gaspillez. »

languages.text: {n}El Hemónculo te despide con un ademán de irritación.{/n} «Si eres incapaz de serme útil, prefiero esperar a que mueras y buscar una herramienta mejor. Debes esforzarte por merecer mi atención y no ser un lastre».
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus waves you off in irritation.{/n} "If you are unable to make yourself useful, I would rather wait for you to die and find myself a better tool. You should be worthy of my attention, not a drain on it."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Hemónculo te despide con un ademán de irritación.{/n} «Si eres incapaz de serme útil, prefiero esperar a que mueras y buscar una herramienta mejor. Debes esforzarte por merecer mi atención y no ser un lastre».

languages.text: {n}Der Haemonculus winkt verärgert ab.{/n} "Wenn Ihr Euch nicht nützlich machen könnt, warte ich lieber Euren Tod ab und suche mir ein besseres Werkzeug. Ihr solltet meiner Aufmerksamkeit würdig sein, anstatt mich zu langweilen."
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus waves you off in irritation.{/n} "If you are unable to make yourself useful, I would rather wait for you to die and find myself a better tool. You should be worthy of my attention, not a drain on it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Haemonculus winkt verärgert ab.{/n} "Wenn Ihr Euch nicht nützlich machen könnt, warte ich lieber Euren Tod ab und suche mir ein besseres Werkzeug. Ihr solltet meiner Aufmerksamkeit würdig sein, anstatt mich zu langweilen."

languages.text: {n}Haimonkulus, irite olmuş bir hâlde elini sallıyor.{/n} "İşe yaramayacaksan senin ölmeni beklemeyi ve kendime daha iyi bir gereç bulmayı tercih ederim. Dikkatime değer olman gerek, sinirimi bozman değil."
languages.original_text: {n}The Haemonculus waves you off in irritation.{/n} "If you are unable to make yourself useful, I would rather wait for you to die and find myself a better tool. You should be worthy of my attention, not a drain on it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Haimonkulus irite olmuş bir hâlde elini sallıyor.{/n} "Eğer işe yaramayacaksan senin ölmeni beklemeyi ve kendime daha iyi bir gereç bulmayı tercih ederim. Dikkatime değer olman gerek, sinirimi bozman değil."
